overview: Ridho, a motorcycle taxi man, saves Putri, a high school student, in an accident. Putri, who is arrogant and snobbish, falls in love with Ridho. They marry, but then find a hard life that leads them to despair. Their shortcut to wealth requires Ridho to become a "babi ngepet" (black magic that transforms a person into a swine demon used to steal money) while Putri becomes the watcher of the candle (that indicates when the person is about to regain his human form).
tagline: DEMI CINTA, AKU TERPAKSA JADI BUDAK SETAN
title: Skandal Cinta Babi Ngepet
